description: Dine out and catch a movie in the cinema
whatYouNeed: A nice restaurant with a nearby movie theater

title: Dinner and a Comedy Show
description: Dine out and have some laughs from a live stand up comedy show
whatYouNeed: Tickets to a comedy show - it's usually a 2 drink minimum or food

title: Bowling and Dinner
description: Knock pins and score points -- then get some food after working up a sweat
whatYouNeed: Bowling alley -- there is usually food in the alley, but nothing wrong with heading a restaurant after!

title: Dinner and a Sporting Game
description: Dine out and watch a live sporting event
whatYouNeed: Catch the local sporting team beat its rival, while getting your noms on

title: Dinner and Karaoke
description: Dine and sing your heart out
whatYouNeed: Look for your local karaoke bar, or book a booth!

title: Arcade Games and Dinner
description: Go to a carnival, or Dave and Buster's, then grab some noms after!
whatYouNeed: Playful attitude, some quarters, and your appetite

title: Nerf Wars!! and Dinner
description: Go to a Dart Mania or a Laser Tag place, then grab some noms after!
whatYouNeed: Playful attitude, aim your safe guns and shoot!, and your appetite

title: Dinner and a Concert
description: Dine out and catch some live music
whatYouNeed: Hard Rock Cafes have live music with no cover, or eat some dinner and watch a concert after!

title: Boxing and Dinner
description: Grab some boxing gloves and take a boxing class with your significant other; after a few rounds, eat dinner
whatYouNeed: Cardio cardio cardio!, and your appetite

title: Just Dessert
description: Just eat dessert -- forget a nutritious meal, who needs those anyway?
